name: Lady Evelyn-Smoothwater Provincial Park
review: Beautiful area, beautiful view from Maple mountain.  I wish I was here on better circumstances.  It's so sad to see this massive fire.

name: Lady Evelyn-Smoothwater Provincial Park
review: Definitely world class canoe destination. Less busy than Algonquin. Rugged portages!

name: Lady Evelyn-Smoothwater Provincial Park
review: My fav provincial park yet! Did a back country canoe trip beginning at the Montreal River put in, paddling to Ishpatina Ridge and back. The calmest waters Iâ€™ve ever paddled! Avoid Snake Portage unless you are up for a challenge.

name: Lady Evelyn-Smoothwater Provincial Park
review: Best canoe camping in Ontario... Possibly the world... I'm biased..lol

name: Lady Evelyn-Smoothwater Provincial Park
review: Very nice park, some very marshy areas and the path is a little hard to follow.

name: Lady Evelyn-Smoothwater Provincial Park
review: Went to Ishpatania ridge. Amazing views at the top of Ontario!!!
